Class ResultExtensions

All behavior for the Result types are defined here.

Inheritance
System.Object
ResultExtensions
Namespace: FunctionalLink.Next
Assembly: FunctionalLink.Next.dll
Syntax
public static class ResultExtensions : Object

Methods

And<T, TFailure, TOther, TResult>(Result<T, TFailure>, TOther, Func<T, TOther, TResult>)

Used to combine two Results if they are both successful

Declaration
public static Result<TResult, TFailure> And<T, TFailure, TOther, TResult>(this Result<T, TFailure> result, TOther other, Func<T, TOther, TResult> selector)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Result<T, TFailure> result

The Result to examine
TOther other

The second result to combine
System.Func<T, TOther, TResult> selector

The function used to combine the values from ResultA and B
Returns
Type Description
Result<TResult, TFailure>

If the Result was successful, the combined value of ResultA and B is returned. Otherwise, the failure from either ResultA or B will be returned
Type Parameters
Name Description
T
TFailure
TOther
TResult

Match<T, TFailure>(Result<T, TFailure>, Action<T>, Action<TFailure>)

Executes one of the two given actions based on the state of the Result. If the Result was successful, the onSuccess Action will be executed. If not, the onFailure Action will be executed

Declaration
public static void Match<T, TFailure>(this Result<T, TFailure> result, Action<T> onSuccess, Action<TFailure> onFailure)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Result<T, TFailure> result

The Result to examine
System.Action<T> onSuccess

The action to execute if the Result was successful
System.Action<TFailure> onFailure

The Action to execute if the Result was not successful
Type Parameters
Name Description
T
TFailure

Match<T, TFailure>(Task<Result<T, TFailure>>, Action<T>, Action<TFailure>)

Executes one of the two given actions based on the state of the Result. If the Result was successful, the onSuccess Action will be executed. If not, the onFailure Action will be executed

Declaration
public static Task Match<T, TFailure>(this Task<Result<T, TFailure>> result, Action<T> onSuccess, Action<TFailure> onFailure)

TFailure

Match<T, TFailure, TResult>(Result<T, TFailure>, Func<T, TResult>, Func<TFailure, TResult>)

Executes one of the two given functions based on the state of the Result and returns a value. If the Result was successful, the onSuccess function will be executed. If not, the onFailure function will be executed

Declaration
public static TResult Match<T, TFailure, TResult>(this Result<T, TFailure> result, Func<T, TResult> onSuccess, Func<TFailure, TResult> onFailure)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Result<T, TFailure> result

The Result to examine
System.Func<T, TResult> onSuccess

The function to execute if the Result was successful
System.Func<TFailure, TResult> onFailure

The function to execute if the Result was not successful
Returns
Type Description
TResult

Returns the result of onSuccess if the Result was successful. Otherwise, the result of onFailure
Type Parameters
Name Description
T
TFailure
TResult

Match<T, TFailure, TResult>(Task<Result<T, TFailure>>, Func<T, TResult>, Func<TFailure, TResult>)

Executes one of the two given functions based on the state of the Result and returns a value. If the Result was successful, the onSuccess function will be executed. If not, the onFailure function will be executed

Or<T, TFailure>(Result<T, TFailure>, T)

Used to transform a Failure state into a Success alternate value.

Declaration
public static Result<T, TFailure> Or<T, TFailure>(this Result<T, TFailure> result, T alt)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Result<T, TFailure> result

The Result to examine
T alt

The function to provide an alternate value
Returns
Type Description
Result<T, TFailure>

If the current Result is a Failure, then the alternate value is applied
Type Parameters
Name Description
T
TFailure

Or<T, TFailure>(Result<T, TFailure>, Result<T, TFailure>)

Used to trade alternative Result values if the given Result is a failure

Declaration
public static Result<T, TFailure> Or<T, TFailure>(this Result<T, TFailure> result, Result<T, TFailure> alt)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Result<T, TFailure> result

The Result to examine
Result<T, TFailure> alt

The function to return an alternate Result
Returns
Type Description
Result<T, TFailure>

If the given Result is successful, it will be returned. Otherwise, the alternate Result is returned
Type Parameters
Name Description
T
TFailure

Then<T, TFailure>(Result<T, TFailure>, Action<T>)

Executes the given action if the given Result was successful. This overload is used to accommodate methods that have a void return signature

Declaration
public static Result<T, TFailure> Then<T, TFailure>(this Result<T, TFailure> result, Action<T> f)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Result<T, TFailure> result

The Result to examine
System.Action<T> f

The function to execute if the Result was successful
Returns
Type Description
Result<T, TFailure>

Returns the given Result after the action is executed

Name Description
T
TFailure

Then<T, TFailure, TResult>(Result<T, TFailure>, Func<T, TResult>)

Executes the given function if the given Result was successful. This overload is the compositional equivalent of Map or Select style functions available in other contexts

Declaration
public static Result<TResult, TFailure> Then<T, TFailure, TResult>(this Result<T, TFailure> result, Func<T, TResult> f)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Result<T, TFailure> result

The Result to examine
System.Func<T, TResult> f

The function to execute if the Result was successful
Returns
Type Description
Result<TResult, TFailure>

Returns another result with either the return value of the given function or the current failure
Type Parameters
Name Description
T
TFailure
TResult

Then<T, TFailure, TResult>(Result<T, TFailure>, Func<T, Result<TResult, TFailure>>)

Executes the given function if the given Result was successful. This overload is the compositional equivalent of Bind, FlatMap, or SelectMany style functions available in other contexts

Then<T, TFailure, TResult>(Result<T, TFailure>, Func<T, Task<Result<TResult, TFailure>>>)

TFailure
TResult

Then<T, TFailure, TResult>(Result<T, TFailure>, Func<T, Task<Result<TResult>>>)

Executes the given function if the given Result was successful. This overload is the compositional equivalent of Bind, FlatMap, or SelectMany style functions available in other contexts.

This is a special case for mitigating interop between Result<T> and Result<T, TFailure>. Without this handler, the return type is: Result<Result<T>, TFailure>

Declaration
public static Task<Result<TResult, string>> Then<T, TFailure, TResult>(this Result<T, TFailure> result, Func<T, Task<Result<TResult>>> f)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Result<T, TFailure> result

The Result to examine
System.Func<T, System.Threading.Tasks.Task<Result<TResult>>> f

The function to execute if the Result was successful
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task<Result<TResult, System.String>>

Returns another result with either the return value of the given function or the current failure
Type Parameters
Name Description
T
TFailure
TResult

Then<T, TResult, TFailure>(Result<T, TFailure>, Func<T, Result<TResult>>)

Executes the given function if the given Result was successful. This overload is the compositional equivalent of Bind, FlatMap, or SelectMany style functions available in other contexts.

This is a special case for mitigating interop between Result<T> and Result<T, TFailure>. Without this handler, the return type is: Result<Result<T>, TFailure>

Declaration
public static Result<TResult, string> Then<T, TResult, TFailure>(this Result<T, TFailure> result, Func<T, Result<TResult>> f)

Then<T, TFailure, TResult>(Task<Result<T, TFailure>>, Func<T, Result<TResult>>)

Executes the given function if the given Result was successful. This overload is the compositional equivalent of Bind, FlatMap, or SelectMany style functions available in other contexts.

This is a special case for mitigating interop between Result<T> and Result<T, TFailure>. Without this handler, the return type is: Result<Result<T>, TFailure>

TFailure
TResult

Then<T, TFailure, TResult>(Task<Result<T, TFailure>>, Func<T, Task<TResult>>)

Executes the given function if the given Result was successful. This overload is the compositional equivalent of Map or Select style functions available in other contexts

Declaration
public static Task<Result<TResult, TFailure>> Then<T, TFailure, TResult>(this Task<Result<T, TFailure>> result, Func<T, Task<TResult>> f)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task<Result<T, TFailure>> result

The Result to examine
System.Func<T, System.Threading.Tasks.Task<TResult>> f

The function to execute if the Result was successful
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task<Result<TResult, TFailure>>

Returns another result with either the return value of the given function or the current failure

TResult

Then<T, TFailure, TResult>(Task<Result<T, TFailure>>, Func<T, Task<Result<TResult>>>)

Executes the given function if the given Result was successful. This overload is the compositional equivalent of Bind, FlatMap, or SelectMany style functions available in other contexts.

This is a special case for mitigating interop between Result<T> and Result<T, TFailure>. Without this handler, the return type is: Result<Result<T>, TFailure>

Declaration
public static Task<Result<TResult, string>> Then<T, TFailure, TResult>(this Task<Result<T, TFailure>> result, Func<T, Task<Result<TResult>>> f)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task<Result<T, TFailure>> result

The Result to examine
System.Func<T, System.Threading.Tasks.Task<Result<TResult>>> f

The function to execute if the Result was successful
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task<Result<TResult, System.String>>

Returns another result with either the return value of the given function or the current failure

Name Description
T
TFailure
TResult

ValueOr<T, TFailure>(Result<T, TFailure>, T)

Used to deconstruct a Result to either it's successful value or a given alternative

Declaration
public static T ValueOr<T, TFailure>(this Result<T, TFailure> result, T alt)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Result<T, TFailure> result

The Result to examine
T alt

The alternative value to return if the Result was not successful
Returns
Type Description
T

If the Result is successful, the Result value is returned. Otherwise, the alternate value is returned

Name Description
T
